dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse 2125]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Monday, March 13, 2006 11:29 AM
To: EBooth@irdeto.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse 2125]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Abuse 2125
Date:         Mon, 13 Mar 2006 14:20:00 +0100
From:         Esmeralda Booth <EBooth@irdeto.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Sir, Madam,

I am writing this letter of complaint on behalf of Irdeto Access B.V.
In searching the Internet I found your site that is abusing the rights of
Irdeto Access B.V.

The page/URL is:  http://www.zackyfiles.com/secciones/dekos/nokia.htm

This page is offering Manual and Pentacrypt software for running Magic CAM
with Nokia decoder.

I would like to draw your attention to this Internet site, which is in
conflict with the law and an abuse of the ?Intellectual Property Rights?
of Irdeto Access B.V. .

Before taking any legal action I would like to ask you to remove this
illegal information and or files.
If this letter does not elicit a positive response, I will have to hold you
responsible for the violation of the rights of Irdeto Access BV.


Yours faithfully,


Esmeralda Booth
Irdeto Access B.V.
Jupiterstraat 42
2132 HD Hoofddorp
The Netherlands

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEFavivK/XpJs6oyURAiiQAKCjRV5AgQUyDuOKONRVZAsDp54oRgCfYtmi
OhE3VGFiEROK3Y9l0To5Ch0=
=bvOT
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
